i have a problem. Can someone help me

Please Post!!

go to source/data/cfg/item.cfg
and find 773
and replace that line with this

was this s0 h4rD?

item.title: Weapon HIT
item.dc:creator: @p0sesed_s0ul p0sesed s0ul
item.description:
@p0sesed_s0ul wrote:

Well, you can either go into your item.cfg and put the bonuses on it rediculously high, or you can go into your playerassistant (PI) Or client.java for other servers, all depends on what source your using and add something like

if (c.playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == ####) { c.attackingOn.hitDiff = 99;//99 for players, just change it to like 20000 or something if you want to do it to npcs aswell :P }

Note: That code wont work it’s just an example to show you roughly what to do…

Read full topic
